title: Fact Check: Don’t believe this morphed picture of PM Modi | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture of Prime Minister Narendra Modi has surfaced on the internet in which he can be seen seated on a small cart being pulled by a dog.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above picture and found it to be FAKE.

On putting the picture through Reverse Image Search, we found the original picture which has a different man on it.

In the above FAKE vs REAL collage, it is clear that PM Modi’s face was superimposed on the man’s face in the original picture using photo editing software.

In conclusion, the above information proves that the picture in question is FAKE.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
